Function reference

All functions

check_dhis2_attributes()
Check the DHIS2 attributes for data import
connect_to_server()
Establish connection to the server
detect_separator()
Detect separator from a string
dhis2_subset_fields()
Subset fields when reading from DHIS2
dhis2_subset_records()
Title
fetch_data_from_query()
Fetch data from server using an SQL query
fingertips_subset_columns()
Subset columns when reading from Fingertips
fingertips_subset_rows()
Subset records when reading from Fingertips
get_base_name()
Get file base name
get_data_elements()
Get the data element identifiers and names
get_data_sets()
Get the dataset identifiers and names
get_extension()
Get file extension
get_fingertips_metadata()
get fingertips metadata
get_id_column_name()
get the id column name
get_ind_id_from_domain_id()
Get indicator ID from domain ID
get_ind_id_from_domain_name()
Get indicator ID from domain name
get_ind_id_from_ind_name()
Get indicator ID from indicator name
get_ind_id_from_profile()
Get indicator ID from profile ID and/or profile name
get_organisation_units()
Get the organisation unit identifiers and names
get_profile_name()
Get profile name from Fingertips
get_read_file_args()
Get arguments for reading from files
get_read_fingertips_args()
Get arguments for reading from Fingertips
get_relevant_data_elt_group()
Get the relevant data element groups
get_relevant_dataset()
Get the relevant dataset
get_relevant_organisation_unit()
Get the relevant organisation units
identify_table_name()
Detect table names from an SQL query
import_redcap_data()
Import data from REDCap under all scenari
login()
Check DHIS2 authentication details
read_credentials()
Read credentials from a configuration file
read_files()
Sub-function for reading files using rio package
read_files_in_directory()
Sub-function for reading file in a directory
read_from_dhis2()
Import data form DHIS2 into R
read_from_file()
Read data from file or directory
read_from_fingertips()
Read from Fingertips
read_from_redcap()
Import data from REDCap into R
read_multiple_files()
Read multiple files, including multiple files in a directory
read_rio_formats()
Title
readepi()
Import data from different sources into R
redcap_get_results()
Check and return data fetch from redcap
redcap_read()
Read all rows and columns from redcap
redcap_read_fields()
Subset fields from a REDCap project
redcap_read_records()
Subset records from a REDCap project
redcap_read_rows_columns()
Subset records and columns from a REDCap project
show_example_file()
Display the structure of the credentials file
show_tables()
Display the list of tables in a database
sql_select_data()
Subset data read from servers
sql_select_entire_dataset()
Fetch entire dataset in a table
sql_select_fields_only()
Select specified fields from a table
sql_select_records_and_fields()
Select specified records and fields from a table
sql_select_records_only()
Select specified records from a table
sql_server_read_data()
Read data from relational databases hosted by a MS SQL server.
visualise_table()
Visualize the first 5 rows of the data from a table
